page.title: 04Whalley Farm Whittington 2
page.content: The farm is situated right at the top of the hill by Whittington.Compared with other farms in the area,this farm gets dry more quickly in the summer and colder in the winter because of the hilly terrain. Mr.Roe works very long hours-on average 8 hours a day plus a lot of hard working overtime when he is harvesting. Mr.Roe employs 3 full time workers.They are 2 cowmen and a tractor man. If you start up a fsrm it is very expensive and can be a bit of a gamble because if you put all of your money into the first year and you have bad weather you could lose all the money and hard work you have put into the farm.
